mapper.select: SELECT kid_no , kid_name , kid_birth , kid_address , kid_protector_phone , kid_precautions , kid_gender , kid_commuting , kid_entrance_day FROM kid LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kid ( license_kindergarten, kid_name, kid_birth, kid_address, kid_protector_phone, kid_protector_phone_reserve, kid_precautions, kid_gender, kid_commuting, kid_entrance_day) VALUES ( #{license_kindergarten}, #{kid_name}, #{kid_birth}, #{kid_address}, #{kid_protector_phone}, #{kid_protector_phone_reserve}, #{kid_precautions}, #{kid_gender}, #{kid_commuting}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') );
